exclude_channel_add.description: Exclude a channel from scam detection.

exclude_channel_remove.description: Remove a channel from the exclusion list.
exclude_channel_remove.channel: The channel to remove from exclusion

add_action.description: Add an action to the scam punishment list.

remove_action.description: Remove an action from the scam punishment list.
remove_action.action: Exact action string to remove (e.g. timeout:1d, delete)

exclude.added: 频道 {channel} 已被排除在诈骗检测之外。
exclude.already: 频道 {channel} 已经被排除在诈骗检测之外。
exclude.not_excluded: 频道 {channel} 未被排除在诈骗检测之外。
exclude.removed: 频道 {channel} 已从排除列表中移除。
exclude.list_empty: 当前没有频道被排除在诈骗检测之外。
exclude.invalid: 没有找到有效的被排除频道。
